comments: See A006784 for the definition of Engel expansion.
references: F. Engel, Entwicklung der Zahlen nach Stammbruechen, Verhandlungen der 52. Versammlung deutscher Philologen und Schulmaenner in Marburg, 1913, pp. 190-191.
P. Erd≈ës and Jeffrey Shallit, New bounds on the length of finite Pierce and Engel series, Sem. Theor. Nombres Bordeaux (2) 3 (1991), no. 1, 43-53.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..300
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Engel Expansion
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Natural Logarithm of 2
Index entries for sequences related to Engel expansions
mathematica: EngelExp[ A_, n_ ] := Join[ Array[ 1&, Floor[ A ] ], First@Transpose@NestList[ {Ceiling[ 1/Expand[ #[ [ 1 ] ]#[ [ 2 ] ]-1 ] ], Expand[ #[ [ 1 ] ]#[ [ 2 ] ]-1 ]}&, {Ceiling[ 1/(A-Floor[ A ]) ], A-Floor[ A ]}, n-1 ] ]
crossrefs: Cf. A002162, decimal expansion of the natural logarithm of 2.
author: _Mitch Harris_
